data.name: 鸡从天降 Demo
data.detailed_description:
Game overview

"Chicken Falls from the Sky" is a pixel-style side-scrolling shooting Roguelike game. This game is made by me alone. In the game, the player controls the protagonist chicken boss, and with the help of friends, defeats the bandits in the forest composed of various predators. The overall game style is lighthearted, witty, and thrilling.

The map is randomly generated

There is a lot of randomness in the game, which makes players have new ideas every time they enter the map. The map of each level in the game is composed of a number of random map blocks. Enemies in the map are randomly generated according to rules such as the current threat level. The strength of the enemy also changes with the threat level. The locations of the chests in the map are randomly generated in several spawn points.

Call for reinforcements

Players can call for support in battle, which is an important feature of the game. Support that can be called includes resource delivery and airborne paratroopers. Faced with various unknown difficulties, players can call the corresponding props to help themselves. Getting help from paratroopers can also give yourself an advantage in combat. Players will also unlock more support skills as the game progresses.

Prop combinations

Players deal with different enemies and dilemmas by using different props. Players can also customize the equipment items of paratroopers to make them perform specific functions on the battlefield. At the same time, for enemies, most props enemies can also be equipped, which makes the game more challenging and interesting.

Resource management

Before starting the level, the player can choose the equipment to carry. But the capacity of the backpack is limited. At the same time, the treasures collected in the level will also be stored in the backpack, which means that the number of treasures you can take away is also limited. Therefore, how to manage resources effectively is also a part of the game.

Fight strategically

A single enemy is very fragile. If there is only one enemy, the player can always win, but in the game players always face multiple enemies at the same time, so the battle strategy becomes very important. items and skills to defeat them.
